title: Peter Donder's Mysterious and Beautiful Robotic Chicken Feet
description: Peter Donders, the Belgian designer who routinely harnesses industrial processes to create objects that might have been sculpted by elves, is working on a mysterious new project. Apparently it's for some sort of contraption that will walk on powered legs, with a design loosely based on chicken feet: No other information has been provided about the project, except for these cryptic statements:Gravity-Controlled Chicken Foot SkeletonNext Gen MechEggsDigitwinss"If we make them walk, we do it in style."
author: Rain Noe
excerpt: Peter Donders, the Belgian designer who routinely harnesses industrial processes to create objects that might have been sculpted by elves, is working on a mysterious new project. Apparently it's for some sort of contraption that will walk on powered legs, with a design loosely based on chicken feet:

html:
Peter Donder's Mysterious and Beautiful Robotic Chicken Feet

Peter Donders, the Belgian designer who routinely harnesses industrial processes to create objects that might have been sculpted by elves, is working on a mysterious new project. Apparently it's for some sort of contraption that will walk on powered legs, with a design loosely based on chicken feet:

No other information has been provided about the project, except for these cryptic statements:

Gravity-Controlled Chicken Foot Skeleton
Next Gen MechEggs
Digitwinss
"If we make them walk, we do it in style."
